page.title: 12Population,Earlston
page.content: Although Earlston is just a village it has quite a large population.It is split into three age groups_ pre_school children, school children and voters.There are 150 pre_school children,325 school children and 1296 voters making a total of 1771 altogether.Of course the population has changed over the years because there has been constant moving in and out but in recent years new houses have been built so the population has risen.There is a big difference in the age between the oldest and youngest resident.The youngest is not even one and the oldest is 92.
